doc:
Esther Sutherland https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Esther_Sutherland 0 Esther Sutherland (August 29, 1932 – December 31, 1986) was an African-American film actress who made a name for herself in several features of the 1970s and 1980s often portraying nurses, maids, spinster aunts, Jamaican women, cleaning ladies, and matriarch types. Esther_Sutherland ( August_29_,_1932 – December_31_,_1986 ) was an_African-American_film_actress who made a_name for herself in several_features of the_1970s_and_1980s often_portraying nurses , maids , spinster_aunts , Jamaican_women , cleaning ladies , and matriarch_types .
